title: AI and Generative AI Transforming Disaster Management: A Survey of Damage Assessment and Response Techniques
summary: Natural disasters, including earthquakes, wildfires and cyclones, bear a huge risk on human lives as well as infrastructure assets. An effective response to disaster depends on the ability to rapidly and efficiently assess the intensity of damage.
